title: Bug 19458[Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems
description: Bug 19458[Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems. The bug is related to the Copy Project dialog UI.
OB: When choosing the project name to be 'test' in the Copy Project dialog, a static text validation error appears on the dialog.
EB: The Copy Project dialog should work without any UI problems or validation errors.
SR:
To reproduce the bug: 
1. Create a single project, say 'test'.
2. Copy and paste the project.
3. On the 'Copy Project' dialog:
   a) With 'Use Default Location' checked, I should still be able to select to view or copy the default location from the edit box below.
   b) It should be possible to choose a path close to the default location, if desired.
